        Parameters:

      • userCanAddKarma

        public boolean userCanAddKarma(int userId,
                      int postId)
        Description copied from interface: KarmaDAO
        Checks if the user can add the karma. The method will search for existing entries in the karma table associated with the user id and post id passed as argument. If found, it means that the user already has voted, so we cannot allow him to vote one more time.
        Specified by:
        userCanAddKarma in interface KarmaDAO
        Parameters:
        userId - The user id to check
        postId - The post id to chekc
        Returns:
        true if the user hasn't voted on the post yet, or false otherwise.
        See Also:
        KarmaDAO.userCanAddKarma(int, int)

      • getUserVotes

        public Map getUserVotes(int topicId,
               int userId)
        Description copied from interface: KarmaDAO
        Gets the votes the user made on some topic.
        Specified by:
        getUserVotes in interface KarmaDAO
        Parameters:
        topicId - The topic id.
        Returns:
        A java.util.Map, where the key is the post id and the value id the rate made by the user.
        See Also:
        KarmaDAO.getUserVotes(int, int)
